 2018-00102018-01-11,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  GAC
ActUnited Nations Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Regulations Implementing the United Nations Resolutions on the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK)
PrecisRegulations Amending the REGULATIONS IMPLEMENTING THE UNITED NATIONS RESOLUTIONS ON THE DEMOCRATIC PEOPLE’S REPUBLIC OF KOREA (DPRK) in order to implement the decisions of United Nations Security Council Resolution 2397 (2017) not already incorporated in Canadian domestic legislation through previous versions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0002 Publication Date: 2018-01-24
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Regulations Implementing the United Nations Resolutions on the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK)
precis: Regulations Amending the REGULATIONS IMPLEMENTING THE UNITED NATIONS RESOLUTIONS ON THE DEMOCRATIC PEOPLE’S REPUBLIC OF KOREA (DPRK) in order to implement the decisions of United Nations Security Council Resolution 2397 (2017) not already incorporated in Canadian domestic legislation through previous versions.
